title: Define matrix inputs and gating rules
description: Specify what “validated” means, which tests run for min vs latest, and what is allowed to be opt-in (live probes). Document environment variables and failure expectations.

title: Add Linux CI job for pinned binaries
description: Add a CI job that downloads (or otherwise provisions) the min-supported and latest-validated binaries, verifies sha256 checksums, and runs the codex crate test matrix against each binary using isolated CODEX_HOME.

title: Nightly release watch (alerts only)
description: Add a nightly workflow that checks upstream Codex CLI releases, computes the candidate version, and opens/updates an issue when the candidate changes. Include signals to verify (release notes parsing for commands/--flags).

title: Maintainer-triggered snapshot update workflow
description: Add a workflow_dispatch workflow that takes a version input, downloads artifacts, records checksums, regenerates cli_manifests/codex/current.json (and raw help captures), opens a PR, and runs the validation matrix.
